presentation_index: The scope of this beta is to test the functionality and algorithmic features.
more_info_index: For more information on Memnix or to report a bug check out the
thx_index: Thank you for contributing to Memnix. A number of updates are to be implemented in the next few weeks. We will keep you updated on this matter.
not_sub: You are not sub to any deck yet
password_max_len: Password must be at most 50 characters long
password_min_len: Password must be at least 8 characters long
do_agree: Do you agree to our TOS ?
username_max_len: Username must be at most 15 characters long
username_min_len: Username must be at least 4 characters long
no_more_cards: You don't have more cards to play today !
question: Question
question_max_len: Question must be at most 200 characters long
question_min_len: Question must be at least 5 character long
answer_max_len: Answer must be at most 200 characters long
answer_min_len: Answer must be at least 1 character long
format_max_len: Format must be at most 50 characters long
format_min_len: Format must be at least 1 character long
image_max_len: Image must be at most 200 characters long
image_min_len: Image must be at least 1 character long
delete_card_confirmation: Are you sure that you want to delete this card?
delete_mcq_confirmation: Are you sure that you want to delete this MCQ?
able_to_play: You will be able to play it
name: Name
mcq_name_max_len: Name must be at most 50 characters long
mcq_name_min_len: Name must be at least 1 character long
answers_max_len: Answers must be at most 500 characters long
answers_min_len: Answers must be at least 1 character long
deck_name_max_len: Deck name must be at most 42 characters long
deck_name_min_len: Deck name must be at least 5 characters long
deck_description_max_len: Deck description must be at most 120 characters long
deck_description_min_len: Deck description must be at least 5 characters long
deck_key_min_len: Deck key must be 4 characters long
publish_deck_confirmation: Do you really want to publish your deck ?
publish_deck_warning: Your deck will be reviewed by our team ! You will be notified by email once we have reviewed it.
success_publish_deck: Your request has been successfully sent to our team. You will be notified by email soon !
